customLanguages.description: A dictionary of custom languages in the project.

languageGlobs.description: A mapping to associate a language to files that have non-standard extensions or syntaxes.

languageInjections.description: A list of language injections to support embedded languages in the project like JS/CSS in HTML. This is an experimental feature.

ruleDirs.description: A list of string instructing where to discover ast-grep's YAML rules.
ruleDirs.title: Rule directories

testConfigs.description: A list of object to configure ast-grep's test cases. Each object can have two fields.
testConfigs.title: Test configurations

utilDirs.description: A list of string instructing where to discover ast-grep's global utility rules.
utilDirs.title: Utility directories
